channel.title: command line on Home
channel.description: Recent content in command line on Home

item.title: Textman Part 1
item.description: a ascii art hero, who has amazing adventures and solves interesting problems. Dev Log The initial implementation sees an animatable ascii art hero that can walk and jump. The engine is a simple entity based system with rendering done on the curses library.

item.title: Yahtsee
item.description: Introducing an unabashedly self-indulgent project Yahtsee. Play the classic dice game from your terminal. It’s even multi-player on-line! Strategically not named Yahtzee to avoid lawsuits! Admittedly I only built it to demo/test app the networking features of my libarg3 library. Its smart enough to open a port on your UPnP enabled router though.
